import React, { useState } from 'react'; const SurveillanceForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ patientName: '', patientID: '', age: '', gender: '', dateOfAdmission: '', dateOfProcedure: '', admittingDepartment: '', departmentPrimarySurgeon: '', procedureName: '', diagnosis: '', procedureDoneBy: '', operationTheatre: '', outpatientProcedure: '', scenarioProcedure: '', woundClass: '', papGiven: '', durationPAP: '', ssiEventOccurred: '', dateOfEvent: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); }; return (
